name: Honotu
description:
A prototype of a game relying on 2D aim! I don't want to gave away anything aside from the bare essentials so I get a good idea of if the gameplay is intuitive enough or not.

Features:

  • 4 levels to showcase the core game aspects and challenges
  • 1 "boss" level included

Goal:

  • Gather as many points as you can before you die. How? Up to you to find out!

Controls:

  • Move cursor with mouse
  • Left-click to select level
  • Esc to Pause
  • While Paused: Place mouse over designated spot (where you left off, to prevent cheating) and Esc again to Unpause
  • Left Ctrl to show/hide mouse

Note: Game might be a bit loud so take caution.
